name: joplin-plugin-bible-verse
author: Kevin Woods
description: Simple joplin plugin that pulls bible verse references and then add the bible verse to side panel

scripts.dist: webpack --env joplin-plugin-config=buildMain && webpack --env joplin-plugin-config=buildExtraScripts && webpack --env joplin-plugin-config=createArchive
scripts.update: npm install -g generator-joplin && yo joplin --node-package-manager npm --update --force
